ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: HOOS Jr, HOOS Subscale Pain, HOOS Subscale Activities of Daily Living
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify the patient reported outcome tool HOOS Jr. and HOOS subscales of Pain and Activities of Daily Living used for hip replacement patients.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify hip replacement patients who completed the HOOS JR. or HOOS Pain and Activities of Daily Living subscales. Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Assessment, Performed datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes representing the HOOS Jr. and HOOS Activities of Daily Living and Pain subscales.),(Exclusion Criteria: Quality of life, sport recreation and symptoms subscales are excluded from this value set.)
